name: Puzzle Game 1-3-4-2
description:
This App is an addictive puzzle game about connecting.

#1 game in 10 countries

Download NOW for FREE !!!

The goal is simple.
•Connect same number - different Color

•Same number - same Color

•4 different number - 4 different Color

•4 different number - sam Color

GAME MODES
•CLASSIC: Same step move. Can you connect as many dots as you can?

• TIME: Can you beat the clock? Connect as many dots as you can in 30 seconds

• STEP: An un-timed moves based mode; Connect as many dots as you can in 30 step

• ENDLESS: Relax and play; the no-limits, gravity shuffling mode of Dots
